intro: Halacsya sendtneri subsp. sendtneri, commonly known as the Sendtner's halacsya, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to the Carpathian Basin. It belongs to the family Plantaginaceae and is characterized by its slender, branching stems and lanceolate leaves. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species in its native range.
